reviews.customers_say: Customers love this cardigan for its cute button-down design that can be dressed up or down, and its well-made construction with thick soft yarn that isn't itchy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. Color is true to photo. Definitely fits like a small size women’s 4. So soft. Warm but not too heavy . Great quality. Read more
items.author: Marcie Phillips

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A cute closet staple
items.body: A cute cardigan is always a closet staple! This was the main reason I wanted to get a versatile cardigan. This cardigan, is a clothing item that can be dressed up, with a turtle neck, and jeans, or dressed down with a pair of slacks or pjs. Of course, it can also be used to layer up, on a chilly day, with a tank top, regular top, or long sleeve top. What I like about this cardigan is the thickness of the fabric. Granted, it is not a cashmere sweater, but I do feel like it is a strong enough material to keep warm. I decided to get mine in a Large, as I like a more oversized look. (For reference, I am 5’4, and around 130lbs.) If you want a more tight fit, definitely size down. The sweater is a good length, as it goes down to my waist. Again, this is a more personal preference though. Something I disliked, was how the button hole seemed a bit big for the buttons, and it seemed to come loose after unbuttoning. For this reason, I won’t be using the buttons, however, it does not deter me from liking this sweater. Overall, this was a good purchase for me. For its versatility, comfort, and price. Would recommend! Read more
items.author: Jennyfer Jones

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Happy with the quality and fit
items.body: Surprisingly soft and cute! I wasn't sure what to expect because of the mixed reviews, but the sweater is actually of great quality for the price. It is chunky, as described, and very warm. Super cute to wear by itself or over a camisole. Bought it in 2 colors. Read more
items.author: Aloha Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the PrettyGarden brand!
items.body: I have bought many PrettyGarden items and find them to be a reliable high quality brand. This sweater is no exception. The fabric is a thick and warm knit but comfortable on the skin. It looks much more expensive than it is. It's a great length because it covers any stomach pouch. I find the bell sleeves stylish and the cuffs make it easy to push up on your arms if you get too warm. Read more
items.author: Mary Williams

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: I don't normally leave reviews on Amazon too often, and I don't normally buy clothes on Amazon because most of the time it looks nice in the picture but it's not the same quality when you get it home but this is different. This water fits so beautiful I first ordered the medium but it was a little too large so I ordered the small and it's perfect. About one in white and then I bought the blue gray one and they are both beautiful high quality just like it shows in the picture. I would highly recommend this sweater it's beautiful. Read more
items.author: bluerose

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very disappointed; could be a great product
items.body: Really nice weight and quality, but ... I ordered a dark navy, in large first. It was a dark teal; beautiful and the right fit, but I have nothing to go with that color. The second was supposed to be the same size but grey blue. It was smaller than the first and a beautiful royal blue. I could have used the color, but had do return again due to size. Really too bad because it felt nice and warm. Read more
items.author: Fuzzy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Oversized Sweaters
items.body: I live in FL. This sweater is just what I was looking for. Great for the chilly mornings and evenings in the winter, and nice for the freezing a/c at restaurants, offices and stores in the summer! I purchased one in Orchid (so pretty) and one in brown. Not a huge fan of acrylic but the material is soft and comfortable against my skin. As stated in the description they are oversized and that is what I was looking for, just really like that look. I ordered them in XL and they fit great. I am 5’10”, 194 lbs. I have not washed them yet so I’m hoping they will wash well and hold up well without pilling or coming apart. Read more
items.author: GreyCat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cropped sweater
items.body: Excellent quality. I have it in black and was looking for a gift for my friend, ordered this color with a black turtleneck to wear under it. The fabric is thick with no fuzz. Deep burgundy color. True to size Read more
items.author: Peggy Benson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Brown, Dark Khaki, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Orange, Light Orange, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Fruit Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
